column3: Latest;Phnom Penh Municipal Court Judge Pich Visal
column6: remanded 17 suspects in Prey Sar prison on drugs charges.------On February 23
column8: the Rock Entertainment Center was raided by police and up to 50kg of drugs were found on the premises.------More than 300 people were arrested
column9: with most allowed to return home after ------signing a contract------.------13 Chinese nationals------ were sent to the General Department of Immigration.------The 17 who went to court are aged between 19 to 47 years old.
